definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
puppet burial object/wooden effigy buried to put a curse on sb

sentences.english: Pinocchio was not able to walk, therefore, the boss sold him to an old drummer.
sentences.chinese: 木偶行唔到，於是老闆就賣左比個老鼓手。

sentences.english: Yes, only a rat puppet beat them out.
sentences.chinese: 沒錯，只有一個老鼠木偶打敗過他們。

sentences.english: On this high note the puppet show commences .
sentences.chinese: 木偶戲就在這陣高昂的調子裏開場了。

sentences.english: We watched a performance which included a puppet show and acrobatics .
sentences.chinese: 我們觀看了一場演出，內容有木偶戲和雜技。

sentences.english: He planned to demonstrate the behaviour at the ceremony using puppets.
sentences.chinese: 他計劃在典禮上利用木偶來演示果蝠的這種行爲。

sentences.english: Geppetto climbed through a window. He saw the little puppet on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 格培多從一扇窗戶爬進來，看到地板上的小木偶。

sentences.english: No longer like puppet, not as acted upon a puppet.
sentences.chinese: 不再像木偶，不採取行動作爲一個傀儡。

sentences.english: The Captain highly praises the puppet show and thanks Maria
sentences.chinese: 上校表揚木偶戲，並感謝瑪麗亞。

sentences.english: Think of yourself as a puppet with a string coming out of the top of your head.
sentences.chinese: 把自己想象成是一個牽線木偶，頭上有一根線牽着。

sentences.english: This is a set of eight The Muppet Show plush toy characters.
sentences.chinese: 這是一套八個木偶表演的長毛絨玩具字。

sentences.english: Besides, the author makes use of traditional puppets and plasticine as well.
sentences.chinese: 此外，作者利用傳統木偶和塑性黏土以及。

sentences.english: In Japan, the tradition of bunraku puppetry dates back hundreds of years.
sentences.chinese: 在日本，木偶戲的傳統可以追溯到幾百年前。

sentences.english: And what is the advantage your puppets would have over living dancers?
sentences.chinese: 而相較於活的舞者你的木偶的優勢又是什麼呢？

sentences.english: And some marionettes can be made to imitate almost every human and animal action.
sentences.chinese: 某些提線木偶幾乎能模仿人和動物的所有動作。
